Record.ClassificationPath: Endocrine System Diseases/Diabetes Mellitus/Diabetes Complications/Diabetic Coma/Hyperglycemic Hyperosmolar Nonketotic Coma
Record.Description: A serious complication of TYPE 2 DIABETES MELLITUS. It is characterized by extreme HYPERGLYCEMIA; DEHYDRATION; serum hyperosmolarity; and depressed consciousness leading to COMA in the absence of KETOSIS and ACIDOSIS.
